abilities.description: Your command vehicle is sealed against high pressure environments and can travel underwater. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to traverse hazardous underwater currents or areas of dangerous debris, boost.

Your command vehicle is equipped with radiation reflective plating. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} from a hostile space environment, boost.

Your command vehicle has a modular design that shifts its physical form to fit the situation. If you take time to reconfigure your ship or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to do it swiftly, declare a stat. Thereafter, when you make a move with your command vehicle utilizing that stat, roll with advantage. With all other stats, roll with disadvantage.
